name: BLITZY
description:
BLITZY is an abstract game about scoring the highest score possible by collecting dots and avoiding lasers.

CONTROLS: Mouse. ESCAPE to quit. F5 to restart.

BLITZY was made in 3 hours and is the last game in my 6 games in 6 days challenge.

Enjoy

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
